( A ) Flow cytometry analysis of splenocytes from a WT or LMP1 transgenic lymphoma for the pan-B cell ( CD19 ) , B-1a cell ( CD5 ) , and Ig heavy chain ( IgM and IgD ) and light chain ( kappa and lambda ) markers .
Shown are the results from WT lymphoma 1 and <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic lymphoma 4 .

This analysis was repeated on four other <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic lymphomas ( 1 , 2 , 3 , and 6 ) showing a similar B-1a phenotype , of which lymphomas 2 and 4 were also doubly positive for kappa and lambda light chains .
